creator: namrata.m50@wipro.com
text:
Hi,

I am facing issues with Jmeter tool for following scenarios on documentum application:
·         Drag and Drop a document into application
·         Import document
·         Export folder
·         Check Out a document
·         Check In a document
 
Through EMC community link got load runner tool kit having necessary correlation file, functions to get UID from content server, to Import, to export through customized codes explicitly used for documentum. With that help I was successful in all above mentioned scenarios with load runner. 
 
I checked in following link which explains about Jmeter test harness , samplers. It says about DFS D6.5 but we are using WebTop 6.7
https://community.emc.com/thread/112631
 
Is it possible to provide a similar toolkit for JMeter ASAP.

Contact me at:

email:namrata.m50@wipro.com; ashwini.n78@wipro.com

ph no:+91-80-30299435
creator: namrata.m50@wipro.com

text:
Bugzilla is not a support forum.
Please use jmeter mailing list for this question.
